<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by a build script. -->

## `filter`

Calls the predicate function for each Push event of the given source, only passing through events whose value meet the condition specified by the predicate function.

### Signature

<pre>function filter&lt;T&gt;(predicate: (value: T, index: number) =&gt; false): <a href="../operator.md#operator">Operator</a>&lt;T, never&gt;;</pre>



### Signature

<pre>function filter&lt;T, S extends T&gt;(predicate: (value: T, index: number) =&gt; value is S): <a href="../operator.md#operator">Operator</a>&lt;T, S&gt;;</pre>



### Signature

<pre>function filter&lt;T&gt;(predicate: (value: T, index: number) =&gt; unknown): <a href="../operator.md#operator">Operator</a>&lt;T, T&gt;;</pre>
